metadata.title: CVE-2021-47367 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:virtio-net: fix pages leaking when building skb in big mode We try to usebuild_skb() if we had sufficient tailroom. But we forget to release theunused pages chained via private in big mode which will leak pages. Fixingthis by release the pages after building the skb in big mode.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
